colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016B (CES DBEN SA THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I 'PHO 'KHRID RIN PO CHE'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI MI, LUNG RTOGS YON TAN DU MAS THUGS RGYUD GDAMS SHING RNAM MANG RIGS GNAS SKYI MDZOD LA MNGA' BRNYES PA SENGGE RI KHROD KYI GNAS BLA MA DGE SLONG DGE 'DUN CHOS 'PHEL CYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA YAV SRAS DANG, MKHAN PO KHRI RIN PO CHE SOGS YONGS 'DZIN BZHI BCU LTAG TZAM GYIS BKA' DRIN GYIS 'TSO ZHING, KHYAD PAR SHAR RTZE RDO RJE 'CHANG GI BKA' DRIN LA BRTEN NAS DBEN SA SNYAN BRGYUD KYI MANG NGAG KHYAD PAR CAN MANG DU THOB PAS DKA' CHEN BYANG CHUB RIN PO CHE GYIS DBEN GNAS SENGGE RI KHROD KYI BSTI GNAS GNAS BLA MA'I @016B GZIMS CHUNG DGA' LDAN GRUB PHUGS SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLA MA NYID KYIS BRIS SO, DGE SLONG DGE 'DUN BZANG, ,MANGGA LAm,,)
